snippet: ROSEN--Baran S.,passed away after a brief illness. He is survived by his wife Margie; children Sarah and Michael; brothers Russell (Eileen) and Alan (Lyn); sister and brother-in-law Susan and Bob Lewin and many nieces and nephews. Our North Star and center of gravity, he will be missed and loved forever. Funeral Sunday, 11:15am, Riverside Memorial Chapel, Amsterdam and 76th St. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Baran S.,passed away after a brief illness. He is survived by his wife Margie; children Sarah and Michael; brothers Russell (Eileen) and Alan (Lyn); sister and brother-in-law Susan and Bob Lewin and many nieces and nephews. Our North Star and center of gravity, he will be missed and loved forever. Funeral Sunday, 11:15am, Riverside Memorial Chapel, Amsterdam and 76th St. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSEN, BARAN S.
